name: 林顯聖
objective: 本課程內容包括控制閥特性、控制器特性、程序動態應答分析、閉環路控制系統動態應答分析、控制器調諧、頻率應答分析與程序控制系統之介紹
schedule:
1-2週 緒論
3-4週 控制閥特性
5-6週 控制器特性
7-10週 程序動態應答分析
11-13週 閉環路控制系統動態應答分析與控制器調諧
14-16週 頻率應答分析
17-18週 程序控制系統
scorePolicy:
期中與期末考 - 80%
作業與平時考核 - 20%
materials:
TextBook
1.Seborg, D. E., Edgar, T. F., and Mellichamp D. A., ”Process Dynamics and Control,” 2nd edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc. (2006)
2.自編講義
Reference Book:
1.Smith, C. A. and Corripio, A. B., ”Principles and Practical of Automatic Process Control”, 3rd edition, John Wiley & Sons, Inc. (2006)
2.Luyben, W. L. and Luyben, M. L., ”Essentials of Process Control”, McGraw-Hill , Inc. (1997)
3.Luyben, W. L., ”Process Modeling, Simulation and Control For Chemical Engineers”, 2nd edition, McGraw-Hill , Inc. (1990)
4.Marlin, T. E., ”Process Control : Designing Processes and Control Systems for Dynamic Performance”, McGraw-Hill , Inc. (1995)
5.Coughanowr, D. R., ”Process Systems Analysis and Control”, 2nd edition, McGraw-Hill , Inc. (1991)
6.Shinskey, F. G., ”Process Control System”, 4th edition, McGraw-Hill , Inc. (1996)
